Name: The Adventures of Plushie Squad
Description: You receive a call from Fulmine, who was asked by a few mysterious "people" to send you an invitation...
QuestDesc: You receive a call from Fulmine, who was asked by a few mysterious "people" to send you an invitation...

Conditions.PreQuestName: The Maiden, The Defier, The Death Crier

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hello, {Male=Mr.;Female=Ms.} {PlayerName}. It's been so long! Ever since you helped with the restoration, more and more Echoes have been flocking to the Plushie Village.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I can't remember the last time everyone's gotten so cheery and zippy.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, yes. And on behalf of those whose names I shall keep a secret for now, I would like to extend a formal invitation to youâ€¦

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You suddenly hear the delicate sound of silvery chimes. As you try to pinpoint the source, you realize it's coming from the Bell of Echoing Heart gifted by the Plushie Echoes before.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sounds like they want to see you as soon as possible. Well then, we'll be waiting for you at the Plushie Village!

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now, settle down everyone. I've already told you {Male=Mr.;Female=Ms.} {PlayerName} is on their way... Oh, you're here!

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: At last! The hero of the Plushie Village graces us with {Male=his;Female=her} presence yet again.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, no. Not at all. We were all waiting for you to start the adventure.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's our first bloom of the morning! These little guys wouldn't want anyone close to it until it finally blossomed.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They said they wanted you to have the very first flower.

Dialogues.Speaker: The Plushies
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Sounds of being happy and shy.)

Options.PlotLineKey: Thanks. It means a lot to me.

Dialogues.Speaker: The Plushies
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Extremely happy sounds.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They're really glad you like it! By the way, there's something else I'd like to ask you, {Male=Mr.;Female=Ms.} {PlayerName}. Have you ever seen a Seaside Cendrelis before?

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As you can see, the rebuilt Plushie Village is now thriving, and the Echoes have been trying out new things every day.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Especially after the Plushies overhead Enzo and I chatted about the Cendrelis, which are flowers that glow like jellyfish, a few days back. They got really curious and excited, they wanted to see it for themselves!

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You don't happen to have some of those magical-looking flowers on you, do you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You find a Seaside Cendrelis from your bag and hand it over to Fulmine.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is it... This is the kind of beauty you find once in a lifetime. Oh, thank you. Thank you so much, {Male=Mr.;Female=Ms.} {PlayerName}! Enzo swore that Seaside Cendrelis were long extinct, and I almost believed that until now!

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Where did you find it, {Male=Mr.;Female=Ms.} {PlayerName}? Can you show the Plushies? If that's okay.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Our Plushie Squad, made up of the best of the best Echoes, was chomping at the bit for a new adventure ever since the Plushie Village was reborn from the ashes!

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Instead of hanging around the village all day, there's nothing more exciting than discovering exotic lifeforms and visiting exciting places!

Options.PlotLineKey: Sounds like a lot of work.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's right! This is all inspired by the stories of your greatest adventures. They'll have a present ready for you at the end of this new adventure!

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No, no, no. Exploring new views is just part of it. They also want to witness the valiant {PlayerName} in action with their own eyes. And, there will be a present ready for our hero at the end of it as well!

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Why yes! While you're at it, do you mind helping them take a few pictures along the way?

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Bubble and Old Bake always get cold feet when it comes to visiting new places. Maybe seeing some of the unique views beyond the village would help them change their minds.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Easy peasy, lemon squeezy.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's great! So...

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: New adventures, here we come.
